summary: REPEATED WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR FAILURE ON 1999 CHEVROLET SUBURBAN.  I COULD RAP ON WIPER MOTOR BOX AND GET IT TO RESUME SEVERAL TIMES, BUT IT WOULD FAIL AGAIN IN 20 TO 30 MINUTES. EVENTUALLY IT FAILED COMPLETELY LATE ON A RAINY NIGHT. I DROVE 30 MILES WITH NO WIPERS IN THE RAIN RATHER THAN BE STRANDED WITH WIFE AND TWO SMALL CHILDREN IN RURAL VIRGINIA WHERE WE HAVE RECENTLY HAD NEWS OF ATTACKS AND RAPES OF MOTORISTS WHO HAD STOPPED TO CHECK THEIR MAPS.   *NLM
